title: Day 18: Your Kingdom Come
description: Psalm 10:12-18, Genesis 37:5,10–11, Matthew 13:18–30.  Jesus taught us to pray, 'Your *kingdom* come' (Matthew 6:10)  The kingdom of God is the rule and reign of God
itunes:title: Day 18: Your Kingdom Come
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 10:12-18, Genesis 37:5,10–11, Matthew 13:18–30.  Jesus taught us to pray, 'Your *kingdom* come' (Matthew 6:10)  The kingdom of God is the rule and reign of God
